Reviews.Title: $150 Brick
Reviews.Author: techaddict
Reviews.Content: While I believe this phone is unlocked, you will find it difficult to get past the opening screen asking you to either create or enter your google account credentials.  Without a T-Mobile SIM with data plan you are dead in the water.  Since I live overseas, I am now stuck with a $150 brick.  Bottom line, if you are not on the T-Mobile network choose another phone.Yes I can root the phone etc. but why should I have to do this on a phone that is advertised as "unlocked"Lastly, if your preferred language is other than English and Spanish then pass.

Reviews.Title: basic phone
Reviews.Author: Cindy Raney "Craney"
Reviews.Content: The phone is a great smartphone but does not have the browser for the market games and no wi-fi. other than that it is great!although it does not let you download pictures sent in a text or download very much from a link.

Reviews.Title: JUAN MOTABAN
Reviews.Author: Domarly Cova "JUAN MOTABAN"
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, es exactamente como se describe en la publicación, gracias. Excelente vendedor, lo recomiendo 100 %. Feliz año nuevo.

Reviews.Title: I received not working cellphone. That cell phone could not use.
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: I don't  like it.  Because I received not working cellphone. That cell phone could not use. I returned back  for  them.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Aleksandr
Reviews.Content: I placed an order for HTC MAGIC and instead went to another phone HTC MY Touch of company T-Mobile, which is not designed for my country.I was very disturbed this work shop amazon and I have no confidence in the staff of this shop.

Reviews.Title: Htc Magic!
Reviews.Author: alfonso ponce
Reviews.Content: I love this phone its great and am glad I researched the phone. It came on time and everything. Very light and fast phone. Great battery life!

Reviews.Title: A slow one
Reviews.Author: Praneet Loke
Reviews.Content: The only good thing about this phone is that it's Google's. A slow phone. Games crash often. Apps work fine. Marketplace is slow. It's a good development phone and that's all I wanted. You can't have this phone as your primary and not be annoyed with it.If you want an Android development you could buy this.

Reviews.Title: Phone does not work with ATT Sim
Reviews.Author: Israel R. Ramos "irramos"
Reviews.Content: I tried to use my ATT sim and cannot get this phone to work, I'm trying to return the phone but it wont let me either...so frustrating...

Reviews.Title: T-mobile MyTouch 3g phone
Reviews.Author: Melody
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my broken Samsung touch screen phone. This phone looks very nice, clean design. The package does not come with a manual. But I was able to download one from the Internet. Because this is my first time using an Android phone, it took me a few days to warm up with the features, apps, and downloading new apps from Android market place. But now that I am used to it, I really like it, particularly the customization flexibility. My phone came with an older version of the Android. I updated it via T-mobile update to version 2.2.1. The battery life is reasonable for a smart phone. It took two full charges to stabilize. I usually charge it every other day. If you are on the phone a lot, play some game, or have lots of apps running in the background, then you will probably have to charge it everyday. One thing I wish is better is the touch screen response. I feel it is somewhat sluggish to my touch. The edge area is worse than the middle part. I know this because I played a lot of Sudoku which takes up the whole screen. My old Samsung touch screen is better than this. Overall, I am satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: terrible performance
Reviews.Author: lorenzo
Reviews.Content: I have only one month with this device, and the truth is that at first seemed very nice, but when I started using it I realized how terrible it is expected there will be any application that you ask. is extremely slow, if you have to find a phone, I suggest that you feel. if you want to surf the web, mama mia, have to develop patience. wait longer than expected. The good thing is the price, but if the device is not functional, so you threw your money.solo tengo un mes con este aparato, y la verda es que al principio me parecio muy lindo, pero cuando empeze a usarlo me di cuenta de lo terrible que es esperar para que habra cualquier aplicacion que le pidas. es sumamente lento, si tienes que buscar un telefono, te sugiero que te sientes. si quieres navegar por la web, mi madre que paciencia tienes que desarrollar. esperaba mas de lo previsto. lo unico bueno es el precio, pero si el aparato no es funcional, tu dinero lo tiraste.

Reviews.Title: Must have a data plan~
Reviews.Author: HaRu
Reviews.Content: very nice outlook, but the touch is not sensitive to your fingertipsthe worst thing of all, YOU MUST HAVE A DATA PLAN in order to even activate the phone!!!i was so upset with this fact~i only want a smartphone and i don't need a data plan!i didn't know i needed a data plan in order to use a smartphone, and i thought if it's unlocked, i should be fine without one............but NO!!so as a result, i have to return it.............sad~~~i really wanted a new phone and this is something i found that i really like after a long search on the net~but, if you do have a plan, this phone is worth it!

Reviews.Title: They are cheating -- Its just 3.2MP camera... & camera quality is Poor
Reviews.Author: Raghu
Reviews.Content: This product look wise its superb, slim sleep, lovely. But when it comes to functionality it sucks.The camera quality is poor. Here they claim it as 5 MP, whereas it is just only 3.2 MP.Also the phone gets heated for just a minute call (call duration: 1:25)it has become so hot. Moreover while using the data plan as well the phone gets heated up.The phone is not ergonomic... You cant hold it for more than 10 minutes continuously.This does not have HTC Sense.You cant sync your outlook contacts. It does not allow it. HTC Sync software does not recognize this phone at all

450 Minutes of Talk Time, 420 Hours of Standby
